Reviews.Title: Cheep TV
Reviews.Author: Paul Fischer
Reviews.Content: The TV works well but is limited to ajustments. I only gave it three stars because I tried to link my cabel box remote to the TV so I only have to use one remote and it will not work. I tried calling the cabel company and that did not help. They said I need to get the code from the manufacturer and that they do not know the code. I asked Contex and they said there is NO code numbers for it. So now I have to use two remotes or maybe a universal remote will work. We will see.... But for $299 dollers it is so far a good TV.

ProductInfo.Features:
Backlight Type:	Full-array  LED
Brightness: 300cd/m2
Dynamic Contrast Ratio: 5000 to 1
Viewable Angle (H/V):	178°X 178°
TV with stand (Width x Height x Depth): 35.67" x 23.82" x 8.26" , TV without stand (Width x Height x Depth): 35.67" x 21.57" x 2.99".
ProductInfo.Name: Contex 39-inch 1080p LED TV (LE39D3)
